title: Quarkus 2.7.3.Final released - Maintenance release
content: Today, we released a new maintenance release for our 2.7 release train: 2.7.3.Final. Thanks to all the people reporting issues, providing reproducers, fixes… , it’s really appreciated. It is a safe upgrade for anyone already using 2.7. If you are not using 2.7 already, please refer to the 2.7 migration guide....
